question.questionText: Bryan taped a golf tee to a globe of the Earth. He shined a flashlight on the globe. The best way for Bryan to demonstrate how shadows change during the day would be to: (rotate the globe.) move the flashlight. Why would this best demonstrate how shadows change during the day?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Shadows change during the day because the Earth is turning. The Sun stays in one place.
